registered_instruments.description: Hydro transmission easement for overhead power lines, including right to construct, maintain, and operate transmission infrastructure

Municipal drainage easement for storm sewer infrastructure including access for maintenance and repairs

registered_instruments.description: Commercial lease for industrial warehouse facility, 10 year term with option to renew

Telecommunications easement for underground fiber optic cable installation and maintenance

restrictions.description: Property zoned Employment Industrial (EI) - permits manufacturing, warehousing, distribution. Maximum lot coverage 60%, minimum landscaping 15%

defects.description: Construction lien lists grantor as 'N/A' - improper form
